channel.title: Lvl requirements?
channel.description:
Okey, after the update i cant find anything on the search button -.-
Soo... what i want is to make requirements for ALL the skillcapes AND Hoods
So please, if you know then help me?

item.title: Lvl requirements?
item.dc:creator: @omgwater omgwater
item.description:
@omgwater wrote:

souleroo beat me to it ~.~

ok, this is probley what your looking for… im useing godsword for example

open client.java and search for

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

you should see something like this…

} f (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune") && ItemName.endsWith("arrow")){ return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60;

now under that you would add (for example) i want gs to have 75 attack requirement so i add this

} else if (ItemName.endsWith("Godsword")) { return 75;
now this is just in the attack part… you can change the first search to defence ect… if that is the kind of requirement you need for w\e your adding.

Hope that helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Lvl requirements?
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

if you have this:

if (ItemName.startsWith("ITEMNAME")) { return ##;
The ITEMNAME is the item name of the item.

The return ## is the level required to wear the item.

Read full topic
